description: Visitors are invited to a descriptive tour of the Rewind: This is Croydon's Music.

factsheet.heading: Enjoy a tour of the Rewind exhibition
paragraphs: Join us for an audio-descriptive and touch tour of our special exhibition, 'Rewind: This is Croydon's Music', uncovering the borough's rich musical heritage.

Croydon has been the home of new music from almost every genre including punk, folk, choral, reggae, Indian classical, rock, grime and more. The exhibition includes photography, oral histories and objects from iconic artists spanning the eras - from the eminent Samuel Coleridge Taylor to Captain Sensible of The Damned, from dubstep idols Skream and Benga to international reggae star Desmond Dekker, and from Croydonâ€™s much-loved singer the late Kirsty MacColl to ground-breaking rap and hip-hop artist Nadia Rose and many more.

name: Audio-Described & Touch Tour of Rewind Exhibition
